channel.title: Gustav Janssons devlog
channel.description: This blog is a try to me keep motivates and a way to see my progress on my current projects. Let’s see how it goes!

item.title: Week 43
item.description: This week I fixed and cleaned up the windows build, removed libraries that aren’t and shouldnt be used, I wrote a custom typeinfo code and made ctti optional. Finally I started on a refactor of the vector classes.

item.title: Week 42
item.description: This week I did some cleanup but most of my time was spent on removing the RTTI requirement from euphoria.

item.title: Week 41
item.description: This week I spent on refactoring my duktype binding library for euphoria. Much has been done, but there is also more to be done before I am finished.

item.title: Week 40
item.description: This week I didn’t do anything except celebrate my birthday. Huray for me.

item.title: Week 39
item.description: This week I didn’t really do much. I read some code, thought about the future and what I wanted to do and spent some time updating my i3 installation. Hopefully next week will have been more productive.

item.title: Week 38
item.description: This week I completed the second season of Iron Fist, and continued onto the first season of Merlin. I also bought a midi controller and added a basic hacky midi input to my synth project.

item.title: Week 37
item.description: This week I implemented a really basic arpegiator to my synth project, and spent the remainder catching a cold, catching up on my MCU and Season 2 of Iron Fist while getting and recovering from a fever and said cold.

item.title: Week 36
item.description: This week I was back on synth programming. I implemented polyphonics and a basic envelope.

item.title: Week 35
item.description: This week I did some work on my synth project, starting to refactor the keyboard input from the actual sound synth so I can play with midi input some time in the future. I also made a skateboarding, mail delivery game for the gmtk2018 game jam called Skate and die. The name is obviously a nod to the classic “Skate or die” but what can you do when you get an idea that absolutly must be created?

item.title: Week 34
item.description: This week I started working again. I did a little work on my software synth and my dotfiles management util/script. In less than a week is the gmtk gamejam and I’m getting hyped.

item.title: Week 33
item.description: This week I started on software synth, and participated in game jam but didn’t really finish it :( On the upside is I added a feature to the assimp library and terminal application that I soon hopefully will add via a pull request.

item.title: Week 32
item.description: This week I mostly spend relaxing and real life stuff. I made a few small games in godot and started on switching my main system from ubuntu to arch.

item.title: Week 31
item.description: This week was my first vacation and I added a OnInit function and creation arguments to the the create function in euphoria. I also, in preperation of the upcomming gamejams, started to play around with godot a bit and started on a smaller platformer test/game thing.

item.title: Week 30
item.description: This week a heatwave struck, so I didn’t really do much. I started on the OnInit callback, but that’s pretty much it.

item.title: Week 29
item.description: This week I made it so that shots are destroyed when the have left the viewport. I also started laying the grounds for adding a init function for when creating entities.
